mapper.select: SELECT score.sdate, playid.Sname, score.shopid, score.groupid, SUM( IF( rule.title = '周转天数', score.score, 0 ) ) AS turnoverDays, SUM( IF( rule.title = '进销存准确性', score.score, 0 ) ) AS inventory, SUM( IF( rule.title IN( '销售同比', '销售环比' ), score.score, 0 ) ) AS sale FROM orange.sm_daily_rule AS rule, orange.sm_daily_score AS score, ods.ods_groupplayid AS playid WHERE rule.id = score.id AND rule.type = score.type AND playid.sap_shopid = score.shopid AND playid.sdate =( SELECT MAX( sdate ) FROM ods.ods_groupplayid ) AND score.groupid =#{groupId} AND playid.gid =( SELECT gid FROM ods.ods_groupplayid WHERE sap_shopid = #{store} AND sdate =( SELECT MAX( sdate ) FROM ods.ods_groupplayid ) ) GROUP BY score.sdate, playid.Sname, score.shopid, score.groupid

SELECT a.sdate, @gid AS gid, a.shopId, c.sname, a.groupid, GROUP_CONCAT( IF( b.title IN( '销售同比', '销售环比' ), b.notes2, NULL ) ) AS xstbDes, SUM( IF( b.title IN( '销售同比', '销售环比' ), a.thevalue_comp, 0 ) ) AS xstbValueComp, SUM( IF( b.title IN( '销售同比', '销售环比' ), a.thevalue, 0 ) ) AS xstbValue, SUM( IF( b.title IN( '销售同比', '销售环比' ), a.score, 0 ) ) AS xstb, GROUP_CONCAT( IF( b.title IN('进销存准确性'), b.notes2, NULL ) ) AS jxczqxDes, SUM( IF( b.title IN( '进销存准确性' ), a.thevalue_comp, 0 ) ) AS jxczqxValueComp, SUM( IF( b.title IN( '进销存准确性' ), a.thevalue, 0 ) ) AS jxczqxValue, SUM( IF( b.title IN( '进销存准确性' ), a.score, 0 ) ) AS jxczqx, GROUP_CONCAT( IF( b.title IN('周转天数'), b.notes2, NULL ) ) AS zztsDes, SUM( IF( b.title IN( '周转天数' ), a.thevalue_comp, NULL ) ) AS zztsComp, SUM( IF( b.title IN( '周转天数' ), a.thevalue, 0 ) ) AS zztsValue, SUM( IF( b.title IN( '周转天数' ), a.score, 0 ) ) AS zzts FROM orange.sm_daily_score AS a INNER JOIN orange.sm_daily_rule AS b ON a.type = b.type AND a.id = b.id INNER JOIN dw.d_bravo_shop AS c ON a.shopid = c.sap_shopid JOIN( SELECT @maxDate := sdate, @gid := gid FROM ods.ods_groupplayid WHERE sap_shopid =#{store} AND sdate =( SELECT MAX( sdate ) FROM ods.ods_groupplayid ) ) AS m INNER JOIN ods.ods_groupplayid AS d ON d.sap_shopID = a.shopid AND d.SDate = @maxDate WHERE a.sdate = DATE_FORMAT( date_sub( CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 DAY ), '%Y%m%d' ) AND a.groupid =#{groupId} AND d.GID = @gid GROUP BY a.sdate, a.shopid, a.groupid, b.flag
